entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as speaking disparagingly about others. She is described as saying "No real use?" and scowling at Fred's ostentatious behavior.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as responding to Hermione's comment and later dozing lightly in an armchair. He is described as saying "Sirius!".

entities.name: Fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as sitting up counting his takings with Lee and George. He is described as rattling his box of Galleons ostentatiously.

entities.name: Lee
entities.description: Lee is mentioned as sitting up counting his takings with Fred and George.

entities.name: George
entities.description: George is mentioned as sitting up counting his takings with Lee and Fred.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as giving up on his Potions essay for the night. He is described as putting his books away.

entities.name: Sirius
entities.description: Sirius's name is mentioned by Ron in a muffled grunt.

entities.name: Weasleys
entities.description: The Weasleys are mentioned as having a crowd around them that dispersed after some time.

relationships.description: Ron and Hermione have a disagreement about the usefulness of others' skills.
Fred has possession of Galleons, which he rattles ostentatiously.
Ron mentions Sirius's name in a muffled grunt.
Harry is working on his Potions essay, but gives up for the night.
